h3.center: Welcome to Suwannee County School District!

p.span: Suwannee County School District will be a system of excellence ensuring all students are prepared for personal success.
Suwannee County Schools will educate all students in a safe and supportive learning environment that will develop life-long learners and productive citizens.

strong.span: The Suwannee County School Board does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:

p.strong: 1740 Ohio Ave. South, Live Oak, FL 32064

strong.span: Under Florida law, email addresses are public records. If you do not want your email address released in response to a public-records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone or in writing.
